data.title: Aggressive Showers Blast Pack Peek
data.description: Here's a simple, but powerful way to contest Showers. Make sure to slide across for an unpredictable peek, as it is sure to catch your opponents off guard.

data.title: Aggressive Teleport Paint Shells From Short
data.description: Use this aggressive and powerful teleport play with your Paint Shells to secure kills on Attackers taking Hookah control.
